books.Title: Bloodstains As Evidence: A Field Manual
Blood Evidence
books.Description: Uses case studies to examine how investigators collect genetic evidence and discusses how DNA has altered crime-solving and the court system as well as the ethical ramifications of cloning, genetic modification, and the death penalty.
